price: 41. Waxay odhan: Xurmo oo dhan Adigaa iska leh (Allow) oo hufan, Adiga ayaa ah Gargaarahayaga iyagu ma aha. Mayee’ Waxay caabudayeen jinka oo badankoodu rumaysnaayeen.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minūna
